summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5829 for the improvement of 7th Avenue Southwest, from West Thistle Street to West Kenyon Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76818 as amended by Ordinance Nos. 76890 and 77351, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
